feed.title: WhaleDeck Releases
feed.subtitle: Self-hosted software releases generated by selfh.st

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.3
New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.4
entry.content:
• Option to hide tags in transaction view (#375, #383)
  • Bugfix for custom certificates (#388, #367)
  • Support for additional banking apps
  • Minor bugfixes & improvements (#380, #387, #352, #384), thank you @rsergeychik

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.5
entry.content:
• BREAKING CHANGE: The app now uses the Android Certificate Store, and does not have the option to provide a custom server certificate anymore. If you are using a self-signed certificate, please add it to the Android Store to keep using the app. (#77)
  • Thank you @j1mbl3s for testing this!
  • Net Worth chart removed for the time being due to API issues in latest Firefly version.
  • Bugfixes (#379, #394, #405, #406)

entry.title: New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.6
New release for Waterfly III: v1.0.7
entry.content:
• Fix for notification amount parsing, thank you @kevinkdev (fixes #417)
  • Fix for selecting bill on transaction (fixes #413)
  • Minor bug fixes & version updates
